name: Glidy Punk
description:
The electronic music scene is in danger of losing its essence. 

Help Guy-Man of Daft Punk avoid Marshmallow the Destroyer for as long as he can to keep the music alive!

Created by :

  1. Reynald Hermanto Simanjuntak
  2. Jodie Rizky Hidayat
  3. Yehezkiel Windriono
  4. Heru Putra
  5. David Hosea Sipahutar
  6. Erastus Mauliate
  7. Faishal Pradipta
